val file_to_process = PathFile + SourceFile

val dfSource = spark.read.option("header",true).csv("abfss://candrisynapsefs@candrisynapseadls2.dfs.core.windows.net/Bronze/D365/ADAXGeneralJournalAccountEntryStaging_2021-09-03-09-37-40.csv")

val dfJournal = dfSource.select(
	dfSource("TRANSACTIONCURRENCYCREDITAMOUNT"),
	dfSource("TRANSACTIONCURRENCYDEBITAMOUNT"),
	dfSource("ACCOUNTDISPLAYVALUE"),
	dfSource("JOURNALNUMBER"),
	to_timestamp(from_unixtime(dfSource("ACCOUNTINGDATE")/1000)).as("ACCOUNTINGDATE"),
	dfSource("LEDGERACCOUNT"),
	dfSource("TRANSACTIONCURRENCYCODE"),
	dfSource("TRANSACTIONCURRENCYAMOUNT"),
	dfSource("ACCOUNTINGCURRENCYAMOUNT"),
	dfSource("REPORTINGCURRENCYAMOUNT"),
	dfSource("DESCRIPTION"),
	dfSource("QUANTITY"),
	dfSource("POSTINGTYPE"),
	to_timestamp(from_unixtime(dfSource("ACKNOWLEDGEMENTDATE")/1000)).as("ACKNOWLEDGEMENTDATE"),
	to_timestamp(from_unixtime(dfSource("DOCUMENTDATE")/1000)).as("DOCUMENTDATE"),
	dfSource("DOCUMENTNUMBER"),
	dfSource("LEDGERNAME"),
	dfSource("GENERALJOURNALACCOUNTENTRYRECID"),
	dfSource("JOURNALBATCHNUMBER")).withColumn("SITE", split(col("LEDGERACCOUNT"), "-").getItem(1))

/*
val df = dfJournal.join(dfSite, dfJournal("SITE") === dfSite("code_site")).select(
                dfJournal("ACCOUNTDISPLAYVALUE").alias("ACCOUNTDISPLAYVALUE"),
                dfJournal("ACCOUNTINGCURRENCYAMOUNT").alias("ACCOUNTINGCURRENCYAMOUNT"),
                dfJournal("ACCOUNTINGDATE").alias("ACCOUNTINGDATE"),
                dfJournal("DESCRIPTION").alias("DESCRIPTION"),
                dfJournal("DOCUMENTDATE").alias("DOCUMENTDATE"),
                dfJournal("POSTINGTYPE").alias("POSTINGTYPE"),
                dfJournal("TRANSACTIONCURRENCYCREDITAMOUNT").alias("TRANSACTIONCURRENCYCREDITAMOUNT"),
                dfJournal("TRANSACTIONCURRENCYDEBITAMOUNT").alias("TRANSACTIONCURRENCYDEBITAMOUNT"),
                dfSite("id_site").alias("SITE"),
                (current_timestamp()).as("date_integration")
        )

val currDateTime = new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyyMMdd_HHmmss").format(System.currentTimeMillis())
val file_path = "abfss://synapse@isphere.dfs.core.windows.net/DWH/GeneralJournalAccountEntry/GeneralJournalAccountEntry_" + currDateTime.toString() + ".parquet"
//df.write.mode("overwrite").parquet(file_path)
dfJournal.write.mode("Append").parquet("abfss://candrisynapsefs@candrisynapseadls2.dfs.core.windows.net/Silver/D365/ADAXGeneralJournalAccountEntryStaging.parquet")
spark.sql("CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS example")
